Name: Rabbit's house
Texts:
You've reached the white rabbit's house. It is a tiny house.
Outside, you meet an old snail who engages you in a long conversation.
You tell her how you got here and how you feel like you don't really have control over what is happening to you.
She offers you a mushroom that you can eat in pieces and change your size anytime.
May be you would like to collect the mushroom.

You meet the White Rabbit and he informs you that Queen's guard arrested Dinah when Dinah chased him upto the Queen's residence.
He won't let Dinah free though, unless you do him a quick favor.
Find a hand fan and glove that he is supposed to take to the Queen but he seems to have misplaced.
You don't seem to have much choice, do you? Let's go find those items.
You are at the White Rabbit's house. If you have found his items, you can give them to him.
